articles.title: Atrocity of blood-thirsty murderer
articles.content:
Atrocity of blood-thirsty murderer 
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a signed commentary today denounces the Kim Young Sam regime for its man-hunting.
   A few days ago, the fascist clique killed Former Director Kim Jun Bae of the Struggle Department of the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils. Earlier, they called out more than 2,000 policemen to suppress the unionists of the Changwon Thongil Heavy Industries Company in a strike and arrested some 50 protesters.
   The Kim Young Sam regime's murder of a righteous youth who took the lead in the movement for independence, democracy and reunification and brutal suppression of innocent workers calling for freedom and right to existence prove that they are a herd of blood-thirsty beasts, the commentary says, and goes on:
   The atrocity of the Kim Young Sam regime hell-bent on the suppression of the people is the last ditch effort of those doomed to ruin.
   The south Korean students and people should never remain passive onlookers to the white terrorism of the puppets.

articles.title: Is "Japanese press association prize" for false report?
articles.content:
Is "Japanese press association prize" for false report?
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- It has been said that the Japanese Sankei Shimbun's report about "suspected kidnapping of a Japanese girl by a north Korean agent" would shortly beawarded the " Japanese press association prize ".
   It is natural that special news items representing justice and truth are honored with proper prizes. But it is ridiculous that the "Japanese press association prize" would go to a false report.
   The Ssankei Sshimbun has long been stigmatized as venal newspaper and its pressmen have engaged in misleading public opinion, bribed by south Korea's "Agency for National Security Planning".
   It goes without saying that the "ANSP" and the Sankei Shimbun invented the fiction about "kidnapping" for the purpose of inciting anti-DPRK feelings among Japanese people.
   Conveying truth is the mission of the press and is the most important thing in their activities. If one engages in deception, he deserves denunciation as hack writer.
   As for the Sankei Shimbun, it has long served the "ANSP". 
Most of the Sankei Shimbun's news items about Korea are what were offered by the south Korean intelligence agency. From this point of view, the collusion between the "ANSP" and the Sankei Shimbun is very obvious.
   Many of the press organs have fully discharged their honorable mission as mouthpiece of justice and truth. But some of them have engaged in injustice and falsity for their moment's profit.
   The Sankei Shimbun has only served an intelligence agency of the south Korean .
   Awarding the prize to a false report carried by such a newspaper is a political cartoon. The fact shows that the "Japanese press association prize" is needed for hack writers.
   What the Sankei Shimbun deserves is not a "prize" but demolition.

articles.title: Press Review
articles.content:
Press Review
  Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Papers here today report that Secretary Kim Jong Il sent thanks to soldiers of the Korean People's Security Forces and public security men for doing good things for society and the collective and to officials and working people of different units for carrying out their revolutionary tasks in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
   Papers edit articles and photos saying that Secretary Kim Jong Il, who has literary and military accomplishment, loyalty and filial piety, is a great leader who enjoys absolute trust from the people.
  Rodong Sinmun carries messages of greetings Secretary Kim Jong Il received from foreign party and state leaders on the 49th anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
   According to the paper, the Pakistani Government sent a large bouquet to the DPRK embassy in celebration of Korea's National Day.
   Papers report that the political bureau of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of the Congo convened an extraordinary meeting and published a statement as regards the institution of Juche Era and the Day of Sun in Korea. Papers carry words of people in different countries in this regards.
   A joint meeting of the central committees of the north headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification and the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification was held to carry through the Juche-based lines and tasks of national reunification advanced by Secretary Kim Jong Il, say papers.
   Printed in Rodong Sinmun is an article on immortal revolutionary activities and feats of comrade Kim Jong Suk, an indomitable communist revolutionary fighter, who led people in the guerrilla zone to overcome difficulties and win victory in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
   Papers say the whole party, all the country and the entire people turn out in harvesting.
   Papers report that O Ik Je, Former Leader of the central headquarters of Chondoism of south Korea, toured various places in the DPRK.
   Rodong Sinmun carries a commentary denouncing the Kim Young Sam regime's brutal killing of the director of the Struggle Department of the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils.
   Minju Joson comments on the anti-national acts of the Kim Young Sam regime to block the improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations.
   Rodong Sinmun runs an article stressing that the peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula is a fundamental guarantee for removal of war danger and for peace.
   Minju Joson carries an article titled "countries concerned should help the reunification of Korea from sincere stand".
   Rodong Sinmun informs the readers that the 15th National Congress of the Communist Party of China was closed.

articles.title: Nepalese Minister praises Korean people
articles.content:
Nepalese Minister praises Korean people
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Buddhi Man Tamang, Minister of Land Reform and Management of Nepal, said in an interview with KCNA that during the visit to Korea he saw the Korean people, ready to devote themselves to their leader and country.
   This is because President Kim Il Sung performed immortal revolutionary exploits and created valuable treasure of idea and because Secretary Kim Jong Il wisely leads the Korean people, he said, and went on:
   "Seeing many creations made by the Korean people and social atmosphere I came to know that the leader and people are firmly united in Korea and that when determined, they can do anything."
   "Rapid achievements made by the Korean people for more than 40 years are not what everyone can do."  
   "The Korean people owe these achievements to their great leader." 
   He expressed the conviction that the Korean people who are firmly united around Secretary Kim Jong Il will make great success in their efforts to defend independence of the country and to achieve the country's reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: Sunrise seen on Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Sunrise seen on Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Mt. Paektu is Korea's ancestral mountain with 1,200-kilometre-long ranges.
   The sunrise seen on the mountain is the most magnificent view loved by the Korean people.
   The people are deeply fascinated by Mt. Paektu, Lake Chon on the mountain and the sunrise viewed on the top of the mountain.
   The sunrise is associated with the enduring feats of three generals who liberated and glorified the country.
   The beautiful and magnificent sunrise reminds the Korean people of President Kim Il Sung, who victoriously led the hard-fought anti-Japanese war, liberated the country and built a powerful socialist state, comrade Kim Jong Suk, who is well known as anti-Japanese heroine who defended the President devotedly in Mt. Paektu, and Secretary Kim Jong Il, who was born as lodestar of Mt. Paektu.
   Lake Chon, in sharp contrast to silence before the sunrise, reflects the grit and superb strategies of the three generals.
   Especially, the indomitable spirit of Secretary Kim Jong Il, the spirit of Mt. Paektu, is mirrored in the sunrise.
   Viewing the magnificent sunrise, the people are convinced that the future of socialist Korea, guided by him, is very bright and that Korea will ever be prosperous along with the august name of the President.

articles.title: Anti-national behavior
articles.content:
Anti-national behavior
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson today comments on the Kim Young Sam regime's anti-national effort to put a brake on improvement of DPRK-Japan ties.
   Upset by the progress in DPRK-Japan relations, the Kim Young Sam regime is asking Japan to keep step with progress in inter-Korean relations.
   The news analyst says:
   Normalisation of DPRK-Japan ties is an issue of establishing and developing good-neighbourhood and friendship between the two countries and it has nothing to do with inter-Korean relations and dialogue.
   This issue is in the interest of the two peoples and will make a new contribution to peace and prosperity in Asia and the rest of the world.
   It also suits the trend of the present time toward peace and reconciliation. 
   The despicable effort of the Kim Young Sam regime to impede this process can never be tolerated as it is an anti-national act going against the nation's desire and the trend of the times.
   Their last-ditch effort is of no use.
   If the Kim Young Sam regime continuously meddles in the issue of improved ties between the DPRK and Japan and tries to impede the process, it will face greater public protest and criticism at home and abroad.

articles.title: Solidarity with DPRK expressed
articles.content:
Solidarity with DPRK expressed
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to support the reunification of Korea distributed a letter of solidarity with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the Chairman and all the participants in the first conference of ministers of culture of non-aligned countries which was held in Colombia.
   The letter noted that the southern part of the Korean Peninsula has been under United States political, economic and military control since 1945 and that the traditional culture has been obliterated there. But, the DPRK has continued to develop culture of people.
   The south Korean people have waged the struggle for withdrawal of over 40,000 U.S. imperialist aggression troops from south Korea and for the reunification with the north, the letter said.
   The letter called for strongly denouncing all kinds of aggressive acts against the DPRK and urged the international community to support the effort to overcome natural disasters in Korea.

articles.title: Worldwide use of Juche Era called for
articles.content:
Worldwide use of Juche Era called for
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Union of Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Communist Workers' Party of Russia, the Russian Society for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and four other Russian political and public organisations released an appeal to the world progressives on September 15 in support of Juche Era now in use.
   The use of Juche Era with 1912 as the first year, a year when President Kim Il Sung, the greatest genius of the 20th century, a prominent international activist and the founder of the Juche idea, was born is a great event in history, the appeal says, and continues:
   "People of generations fighting for freedom and welfare of the working people will have a better knowledge of the significance of the event in world history with the passage of time, and they will be grateful to the Secretary Kim Jong Il, who saw that an opportune resolution reflecting the desire of the people and requirements of history was adopted."
   "We welcome the resolution on the eternal memory of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the cause of independence of the people on the globe, and express willingness to actively help propagate and disseminate it in every way."
   "We fully support the resolution on the use of Juche Era and call upon the world progressives to disseminate and use it in practice."

articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il greets comrade Jiang Zemin
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il greets comrade Jiang Zemin
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il, Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army, sent a message of greetings today to comrade Jiang Zemin, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission.
   The message says:
   On behalf of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and on my own behalf, I extend warmest congratulations to you on the successful conclusion of the 15th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and on your reelection as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission.
   Your reelection proves that the entire membership of your party and the Chinese people deeply respect and trust you.
   I hope the fraternal Chinese people under the leadership of the Communist Party of China headed by you will make great achievements in the effort to fulfil the vast tasks set forth by the 15th National Congress of your party.
   Availing myself of this opportunity to express my belief that the traditional Korea-China friendship which has developed standing all trials of history will grow stronger in the cause of socialist construction and reunification in our two countries, I sincerely wish you good health as well as greater success in your work.
